item.description:
Hey folks,

The Sea Monsters have been tearing it up every sunday night at Precinct in Somerville's Union Square. They're an incredible collection of excellent boston area musicians and their shows are eclectic and electric, guaranteed to get you up on your feet.

I know, I know, Sunday at 10:00 seems a bit crazy when you think about it. So don't think about it, just come on out and have some fun - and see the Sea Monsters.

This is a joint Meetup with Fun with Alcohol so we usually get 5-10 attendees...
item.how_to_find_us: i look more or less like my profile pic. i'll also send a cell # at about 8p.
item.name: Sea Monsters @ Precinct
